languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Удары{/g} этого существа вытягивают из цели жизненные силы. Каждая атака накладывает на цель +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g} до конца боя, если цель не проходит проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}.
languages.original_text: The hits of this creature drain vitality from its enemies. Successful attacks of the creature apply +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect until the end of combat if targets of these attacks fail a Toughness resistance test.

languages.text: This creature's attacks drain vitality from its enemies. Successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} inflict +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect until the end of combat if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Удары{/g} этого существа вытягивают из цели жизненные силы. Каждая атака накладывает на цель +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g} до конца боя, если цель не проходит проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This creature's attacks drain vitality from its enemies. Successful hits inflict +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect until the end of combat if the target fails a Toughness resistance test.

languages.text: Los ataques de esta criatura drenan la vitalidad de sus enemigos. Los {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactos{/g} infligen +1 acumulación del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g} hasta el final del combate si el objetivo no supera una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks drain vitality from its enemies. Successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} inflict +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect until the end of combat if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de esta criatura drenan la vitalidad de sus enemigos. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactos{/g} infligen +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g} hasta el final del combate si el objetivo no supera una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.

languages.text: 此生物的攻击会盗取目标的生命能量。若此目标成功{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若目标未能通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}效果，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks drain vitality from its enemies. Successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} inflict +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect until the end of combat if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的攻击会盗取目标的生命能量。若此目标成功{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，若目标未能通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，持续至战斗结束

此生物的攻击会盗取目标的生命能量。若此目标成功{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，若目标未能通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，持续至战斗结束

languages.text: この生物の攻撃は敵の生命力を吸い取る。攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しないと戦闘終了までに{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}効果のスタックを+1負わせられる。
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks drain vitality from its enemies. Successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} inflict +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect until the end of combat if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物の攻撃は敵の生命力を吸い取る。攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g} 抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しないと戦闘終了までに{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}のスタックを+1負わせられる。

この生物の攻撃は敵の生命力を吸い取る。攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g} 抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しないと戦闘終了までに{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}のスタックを+1負わせられる。

languages.text: Diese Kreatur entzieht ihren Feinden Lebenskraft. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} fügenbis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 des {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}-Effekts hinzu, wenn das Ziel mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} scheitert.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks drain vitality from its enemies. Successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} inflict +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect until the end of combat if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur entzieht ihren Feinden Lebenskraft. {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} fügen +1 des {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes hinzu, wenn das Ziel mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} scheitert.

languages.text: Les attaques de cette créature aspirent la vitalité de ses ennemis. Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coups{/g} réussis infligent +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat si la cible échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks drain vitality from its enemies. Successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} inflict +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect until the end of combat if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques de cette créature aspirent la vitalité de ses ennemis. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coups{/g} réussis infligent +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat si la cible échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, düşmanlarının canlılığını çeker. Başarılı {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşlar{/g}, hedef {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçemezse +1 {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}yorgunluk{/g} etkisi birikimi oluşturur. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks drain vitality from its enemies. Successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} inflict +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect until the end of combat if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.
